glsa.title: OpenDoas: Insufficient environment filtering
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in OpenDoas could lead to privilege escalation.

background.p: OpenDoas allows users to run commands as other users.

description.p: OpenDoas does not properly filter the PATH variable from the resulting shell after escalating privileges.

impact.p: A local attacker with control of a userâ€™s PATH variable could escalate privileges if that user uses OpenDoas with a poisoned PATH variable.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All OpenDoas users should upgrade to the latest version:
